div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2330 Caudete de las Fuentes (= Los Villares), 80 km. W of Valencia, 1960? Burial: 3rd cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 4 AR, hacksilber Emporiae: 1 dr., 2 dr. frag. Roman Rep.: 1 quadrig. Disposition: unknown Raddatz, Schatzfunde, pp. 205-6, illus.
